title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama project: get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, generate completions via simple async/sync client.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; browser & Node.js ready, Promise-based API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama endpoints for chat, embeddings, and tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now Open WebUI) with chat history, RAG, multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; streaming & non-streaming chat, embeddings, list/local model ops.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async wrappers for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli (node)
summary: Convenient Node CLI for chatting with any Ollama model from the terminal with markdown rendering.

title: Ollama-Gateway
summary: Lightweight Cloudflare Worker that exposes an OpenAI-compatible gateway in front of Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot (vscode)
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a Copilot-like inline code assistant.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama for embeddings + generation and Chroma for vector storage.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-crewai
summary: CrewAI plugin that enables local Ollama models to act as autonomous agents with tools & memory.

title: ollama-camel
summary: CAMEL-AI framework adapter for Ollama, supporting role-playing agents and multi-model chats.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run docker-compose stack bundling Ollama, Open-WebUI, and GPU runtime support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-selector.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module that provides injectable Ollama service with async configuration and streaming support.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer-backed process management and Telemetry events.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for chatting and generating embeddings with Ollama, supports streaming and custom options.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and conversation memory.
